mainText:
Thank you Steve Jobs for walking on this planet.
You have been my biggest inspiration ever since I have heard of you.
You have had many hardships in life, as have I, but you continued to pursue
your visions, passions, and dreams and have become the greatest legend of
our century.
You showed how having a strong mindset and not giving up can lead to respect
and success.
Thank you for being such an inspiration to my life and everyone else's as
well. It saddens me how my greatest inspiration has left this universe, but
I will continue to hold you as an inspiration.
author: Tim
